effect.sun_moon: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn. Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn. Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn. Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.

short_effect.sun_moon: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.
